trans-unit.source: Provides a validation summary adapter class for the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 提供 HTML 配接器集的驗證摘要配接器類別。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlValidationSummaryAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlValidationSummaryAdapter" /> 類別的執行個體。
這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回關聯控制項的強型別參考。
這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 關聯控制項的強型別參考。

trans-unit.source: An object (defined by <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />) that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: (由 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 所定義的) 物件，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called after an object, such as a form or a page, is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 物件 (例如表單或頁面) 初始化之後呼叫。
這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 要接收輸出的文字寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: 由控制項的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> 方法呼叫，用以執行呈現。
這個 API 已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see> (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。
